item.title: Need help again [Java Is My Bitch needed]
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

[quote=“iceman327, post:17, topic:167262”]so change this:

else if (playerRights >= 3) { int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2]; String victim = p5.playerName; PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); appendToBanned(victim); BufferedWriter bw = null; }

Into

else if (playerRights >= 3) { int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2]; String victim = p5.playerName; PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); appendToBanned(victim); BufferedWriter bw = null; { String victim = command.substring(8); if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase("iceman")){ sendMessage("You can not ban the owner!"); } }[/quote]

No lol.

else if (playerRights >= 3) { int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2]; String victim = p5.playerName; if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase("iceman")){ sendMessage("You can not ban the owner!"); } else { PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); appendToBanned(victim); BufferedWriter bw = null; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help again [Java Is My Bitch needed]
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:13, topic:167262”]No no, isnt that like… backwards? i would do it like

[code]
if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights == 3))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“hippie”)){
sendMessage(“You can not ban the owner!”);
}

else {

PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
}[/code][/quote]

Thanks, could you help me fix my right click ban so that I can’t be banned via right click

Read full topic

{

if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase(“hippie”)){
sendMessage(“You can not ban the owner!”);
}

else {

PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
}[/code]

item.title: Need help again [Java Is My Bitch needed]
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“iceman327, post:8, topic:167262”]Okay and for my right click I have this

else if (playerRights >= 3) { int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2]; String victim = p5.playerName; PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); appendToBanned(victim); BufferedWriter bw = null; } else { if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("iceman")) { sendMessage("Oh no you don't, can't ban meh!"); disconnected = true; } }[/quote]

Thats like so wrong.

Looking at that, only Owner + can use it, look at the playerRights, you shouldn’t have a co-owner anyways and if you do, he won’t ban you. If he does, just shut down server, start it up and ipban him, problem resolved.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Ok Where it says that:

put:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“iceman”)) {
playerRights = 3;
}

So even if someone demotes you, when you log back in you will have 3 playerRights again.

item.title: Need help again [Java Is My Bitch needed]
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

First of all:

if (command.startsWith("Demote") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Only people with player Rights Greater or equal to 3 can use it.

Admin’s playerrights are 2, so therefore cannot use the commands.

Why the hell would your co-owner ban you or ipban you? Does he have playerRights of 3, if he does. and tries to demote you, your server should already read that your the owner, so even if he demotes you, your playerRights will stay the same because its reading it from client.java, or if you don’t have that, make your co-owner Playerights 2.

And make the neccessary arrangements to commands.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help again [Java Is My Bitch needed]

item.title: Need help again [Java Is My Bitch needed]
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“Demote”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

Also My co owner can still ban me via right click

Read full topic
